bug.author: truell20
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://halite.io/game-player-stats>https://halite.io/game-player-stats</denchmark-link> won't load in my Chrome browser. It seems that its loading http resources. Console output: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4297743/31874275-5f516828-b796-11e7-9855-bee23ea29209.PNG></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Yep known issue. Will fix it today.
This should be fixed in the next deployment. Directly linking to the stats dashboard
